_meta.title: Wealth & Finance 재물운
_meta.description: Financial guidance, abundance mindset, and practical money wisdom through tarot

The Fool.wealth_meaning: New financial beginnings. Taking a risk on a new income source. Don't let fear of financial insecurity stop new ventures.
The Fool.korean: 새로운 재정적 시작. 새로운 수입원에 대한 위험 감수. 재정적 불안에 대한 두려움이 새로운 벤처를 막지 않게 하세요.
The Fool.investment: Consider new, unconventional investments. Fresh opportunities ahead.
The Fool.income: New income streams appear from unexpected sources.
The Fool.spending: Be open to spending on new experiences that lead to growth.
The Fool.advice: Sometimes the biggest financial gains require the biggest leaps of faith.

The Magician.wealth_meaning: You have all the skills to create wealth. Manifest financial goals through focused action. Your talents are monetizable.
The Magician.korean: 부를 창출할 모든 기술을 갖추고 있습니다. 집중된 행동으로 재정 목표를 실현하세요.
The Magician.investment: Use your knowledge to make smart investment choices.
The Magician.income: Multiple income streams possible. Monetize your skills.
The Magician.spending: Invest in tools and education that increase your earning power.
The Magician.timing: Financial manifestation power is high - act now
The Magician.advice: You have the power to create the wealth you desire. Use all your resources.

The High Priestess.wealth_meaning: Hidden financial opportunities exist. Trust your intuition about money matters. Information is your advantage.
The High Priestess.korean: 숨겨진 재정적 기회가 존재합니다. 돈 문제에 대한 직감을 신뢰하세요.
The High Priestess.investment: Research before investing. Hidden information affects outcomes.
The High Priestess.income: Undisclosed income opportunities may appear. Stay alert.
The High Priestess.spending: Trust gut feelings about major purchases.
The High Priestess.timing: Wait for more financial clarity before major decisions
The High Priestess.advice: Your intuition about money is stronger than you think. Listen to it.

The Empress.wealth_meaning: Abundance flows freely. Financial growth through nurturing investments. Prosperity through creativity and patience.
The Empress.korean: 풍요가 자유롭게 흐릅니다. 투자를 육성하여 재정적 성장. 창의성과 인내를 통한 번영.
The Empress.investment: Growth investments flourish. Real estate, nature-based businesses favored.
The Empress.income: Income grows organically. Creative endeavors pay off.
The Empress.spending: Invest in comfort, beauty, and quality of life.
The Empress.timing: Steady financial growth period - plant seeds for long-term abundance
The Empress.advice: Nurture your finances like a garden. Abundance grows where attention goes.

The Emperor.wealth_meaning: Financial structure and control. Build stable wealth through discipline. Long-term security through systematic approach.
The Emperor.korean: 재정적 구조와 통제. 규율을 통해 안정적인 부를 구축하세요.
The Emperor.investment: Conservative, structured investments. Blue-chip stocks, bonds.
The Emperor.income: Increase income through leadership and authority positions.
The Emperor.spending: Budget strictly. Control expenses with discipline.
The Emperor.timing: Time to establish long-term financial structures
The Emperor.advice: Build your financial empire on a foundation of discipline and structure.

The Hierophant.wealth_meaning: Traditional financial wisdom applies. Seek advice from financial professionals. Conventional investments favored.
The Hierophant.korean: 전통적인 재정 지혜가 적용됩니다. 재정 전문가의 조언을 구하세요.
The Hierophant.investment: Traditional investment vehicles - mutual funds, retirement accounts.
The Hierophant.spending: Follow conventional financial wisdom. Avoid get-rich-quick schemes.
The Hierophant.timing: Good for traditional financial planning and professional advice
The Hierophant.advice: Sometimes the traditional path to wealth is the most reliable.

The Lovers.wealth_meaning: Important financial decisions require heart and head alignment. Partnerships affect finances. Choose investments you believe in.
The Lovers.korean: 중요한 재정적 결정은 가슴과 머리의 조화가 필요합니다. 파트너십이 재정에 영향을 미칩니다.
The Lovers.investment: Invest in companies whose values align with yours.
The Lovers.income: Financial partnerships or joint ventures are highlighted.
The Lovers.spending: Shared finances with partners need attention.
The Lovers.timing: Major financial choices approaching - choose wisely
The Lovers.advice: The best financial decisions align with your deepest values.

The Chariot.wealth_meaning: Aggressive pursuit of wealth pays off. Overcome financial obstacles through determination. Victory in financial competitions.
The Chariot.korean: 부의 적극적인 추구가 성과를 냅니다. 결단력으로 재정적 장애물을 극복하세요.
The Chariot.investment: Active investment strategies outperform passive ones now.
The Chariot.income: Push for raises, new clients, or better deals. Your determination wins.
The Chariot.spending: Invest in things that help you move forward faster.
The Chariot.timing: Push hard for financial goals - victory is within reach
The Chariot.advice: Drive toward your financial goals with unwavering determination.

Strength.wealth_meaning: Financial success through patience. Long-term wealth building beats quick gains. Steady discipline yields results.
Strength.korean: 인내를 통한 재정적 성공. 장기 부 축적이 빠른 이익을 이깁니다.
Strength.investment: Patient, long-term investment strategies. Compounding works for you.
Strength.income: Steady income growth through persistent effort.
Strength.spending: Self-control with spending pays off long-term.
Strength.timing: Focus on long-term financial strength over quick wins
Strength.advice: True wealth is built through patient, consistent effort over time.

The Hermit.wealth_meaning: Financial wisdom through careful analysis. Independent financial decisions. Simple living may increase wealth.
The Hermit.korean: 신중한 분석을 통한 재정적 지혜. 독립적인 재정 결정.
The Hermit.investment: Research deeply before investing. Contrarian strategies may work.
The Hermit.income: Solo or consulting income. Expert fees for specialized knowledge.
The Hermit.spending: Minimalist approach to spending. Value over quantity.
The Hermit.timing: Time for financial reflection and research
The Hermit.advice: Sometimes the path to wealth is through simplicity and wisdom, not accumulation.

Wheel of Fortune.wealth_meaning: Financial luck is changing. Major money shifts are destined. Be ready for sudden financial opportunities.
Wheel of Fortune.korean: 재정적 운이 바뀌고 있습니다. 주요 돈 변화가 운명되어 있습니다.
Wheel of Fortune.investment: Luck favors prepared investors. Unexpected opportunities arise.
Wheel of Fortune.income: Sudden income changes - windfalls or unexpected expenses.
Wheel of Fortune.advice: Fortune is turning. Be ready to act when opportunity appears.

Justice.wealth_meaning: Financial karma balances. Fair financial dealings bring rewards. Legal money matters highlighted.
Justice.korean: 재정적 카르마가 균형을 이룹니다. 공정한 재정 거래가 보상을 가져옵니다.
Justice.investment: Ethical investments perform well. ESG considerations matter.
Justice.income: Fair compensation for your work. Contract negotiations.
Justice.spending: Balanced budgets. Pay debts and receive what's owed.
Justice.timing: Financial contracts, legal matters, tax considerations
Justice.advice: Financial karma is real. Fair dealing creates lasting wealth.

The Hanged Man.wealth_meaning: Financial pause or sacrifice. Short-term loss for long-term gain. See money from a different perspective.
The Hanged Man.korean: 재정적 일시정지 또는 희생. 장기적 이익을 위한 단기적 손실.
The Hanged Man.investment: Hold positions despite short-term losses. Perspective matters.
The Hanged Man.income: Income may pause. Use time to restructure approach.
The Hanged Man.spending: Pause major purchases. Wait for clarity.
The Hanged Man.timing: Not the time to push for financial gains - wait
The Hanged Man.advice: Sometimes the best financial move is to wait and see things differently.

Death.wealth_meaning: Financial transformation. Old income sources end, new ones begin. Let go of what's not working financially.
Death.korean: 재정적 변화. 오래된 수입원이 끝나고 새로운 것이 시작됩니다.
Death.investment: Time to exit positions that aren't performing. Portfolio restructuring.
Death.income: Old income streams die. New ones are being born.
Death.spending: End wasteful spending habits. Financial renewal.
Death.advice: Financial rebirth requires letting go of what no longer serves you.

Temperance.wealth_meaning: Balanced finances through moderation. Steady wealth building. Patient financial approach works best.
Temperance.korean: 절제를 통한 균형 잡힌 재정. 꾸준한 부 축적. 인내심 있는 재정 접근이 최선입니다.
Temperance.investment: Balanced portfolio. Diversification. Moderate risk tolerance.
Temperance.income: Steady income growth through balanced effort.
Temperance.spending: Moderate spending. Balance needs and wants.
Temperance.timing: Patient financial approach yields best results
Temperance.advice: Financial balance creates lasting wealth. Avoid extremes.

The Devil.wealth_meaning: Examine unhealthy money attachments. Greed, debt slavery, or financial obsession. Break free from money fears.
The Devil.korean: 건강하지 못한 돈 집착을 검토하세요. 탐욕, 부채 노예, 또는 재정적 집착.
The Devil.investment: Beware of investments driven by greed or fear. Avoid traps.
The Devil.income: Are you enslaved to your income? Consider if the trade-off is worth it.
The Devil.spending: Address addictive or unconscious spending patterns.
The Devil.timing: Face financial shadows and unhealthy patterns now
The Devil.advice: Money is a tool, not a master. Break free from financial bondage.

The Tower.wealth_meaning: Sudden financial upheaval. Market crashes, job loss, or unexpected expenses. From financial chaos, rebuild better.
The Tower.korean: 갑작스러운 재정적 격변. 시장 붕괴, 실직, 또는 예상치 못한 비용.
The Tower.investment: Sudden market changes. Be prepared for volatility.
The Tower.income: Unexpected income disruption. Emergency funds matter.
The Tower.advice: Financial towers may fall, but you can rebuild on stronger foundations.

The Star.wealth_meaning: Hope for financial future. Recovery after loss. Dream of abundance becomes reality. Generosity attracts more.
The Star.korean: 재정적 미래에 대한 희망. 손실 후 회복. 풍요의 꿈이 현실이 됩니다.
The Star.investment: Invest in your dreams. Hope-based rather than fear-based decisions.
The Star.income: Income recovery after difficulties. New sources of abundance.
The Star.spending: Generous spending creates positive financial karma.
The Star.timing: Financial recovery and hope manifest now
The Star.advice: Keep faith in financial abundance. Hope attracts prosperity.

The Moon.wealth_meaning: Financial confusion or hidden matters. Investments may not be as they seem. Trust intuition, but verify facts.
The Moon.korean: 재정적 혼란 또는 숨겨진 문제. 투자가 보이는 대로가 아닐 수 있습니다.
The Moon.investment: Hidden risks in investments. Due diligence essential.
The Moon.income: Unclear income situation. Hidden costs or earnings.
The Moon.spending: Beware of impulse spending based on emotion.
The Moon.timing: Wait for financial clarity before major decisions
The Moon.advice: In financial fog, move slowly and trust your instincts.

The Sun.wealth_meaning: Financial success and abundance. Clear financial path. Prosperity shines. Joyful relationship with money.
The Sun.korean: 재정적 성공과 풍요. 명확한 재정 경로. 번영이 빛납니다.
The Sun.investment: Successful investments. Clear returns. Confidence in choices.
The Sun.income: Abundant income. Financial clarity and success.
The Sun.spending: Enjoy spending on what brings genuine joy.
The Sun.timing: Excellent period for financial success and growth
The Sun.advice: Financial abundance is your birthright. Enjoy prosperity with gratitude.

Judgement.wealth_meaning: Financial evaluation and reckoning. Past financial decisions reviewed. Answer the call to financial responsibility.
Judgement.korean: 재정적 평가와 결산. 과거 재정 결정 검토. 재정적 책임에 대한 부름에 응답하세요.
Judgement.investment: Review and judge investment performance. Make adjustments.
Judgement.income: Past efforts pay off. Financial karma returns.
Judgement.spending: Evaluate spending habits. Time for financial reckoning.
Judgement.timing: Financial audits, reviews, and significant evaluations
Judgement.advice: Your financial past leads to your financial future. Learn and adjust.

The World.wealth_meaning: Financial completion and fulfillment. Major financial goals achieved. Abundance and security. Ready for next level.
The World.korean: 재정적 완성과 성취. 주요 재정 목표 달성. 풍요와 안정.
The World.investment: Investment goals reached. Time to set new targets.
The World.spending: Enjoy the fruits of your financial labor.
The World.advice: You've achieved financial success. Celebrate, then set new horizons.

pentacles_emphasis.note: Pentacles suit is especially significant for wealth readings
